title: Videoconferencing-Based Political and International Relations Education Design: Project-Centered Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Theoretical Understanding of Political Science and International Relations, Competency in Digital Tool Utilization
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service teachers to strengthen political education methodologies. Conducting interdisciplinary projects using video conferencing technology in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can generate three or more critical thinking questions analyzing international relations issues.
They take a leading role two or more times in collaborative projects with non-Western experts using video conferencing tools.
Educational materials developed through PBL tasks meet achievement criteria of 80% or higher in peer and summative evaluations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
